ref: 3826 kharkhōda ʻ a kind of magic ʼ Rājat. [khārkhōṭa -- Car., kākhōrda -- m. ʻ a kind of evil spirit ʼ BHSk. ← Ir. (Av. kaxvarda ʻ wizard ʼ) → Arm. kaxard ʻ magician ʼ]
